description:

# Changelog

Updated on November 15, 2025

- Refactor status icon handling in BatchBuilderWindow to use text labels instead of textures

Updated on November 15, 2025

## 2.204.21

Updated on November 15, 2025

## 2.204.20

Updated on November 14, 2025

Updated on November 14, 2025
